title: Using Powertoys Keyboard Manager to start Firefox with Address Bar focus
content:
Hi,

I'm using Powertoys Keyboard Manager to start Firefox from keyboard Shortcuts. It work almos perfectly except for focusing the newly started window.

The windows opens well, but i' have to click in it to take the focus of it, otherwise i can't type in address bar for example.

I tried to add -foreground in the shortcut parameters, but still not working.

Any idea ?

Thank you very much.

title: Firefox AI Chatbot in the sidebar Settings.
content: I am using the Firefox AI Chatbot in the sidebar and facing an issue with the text input behavior. Currently, pressing Enter immediately sends the message instead of creating a new line. This makes it difficult to format or write longer messages. It would be very helpful to have an option to change this behavior—so that pressing Enter adds a new line, while something like Shift+Enter (or a setting toggle) could be used to send. Many chat apps and AI tools provide this flexibility, and adding it to the Firefox sidebar would make the experience much more user-friendly.

title: Saved password not showing in Mozilla Firefox account?
content: I’m facing an issue with my Mozilla account. I have saved login details in Firefox, but when I try to sync or check them on another device, the saved password is not showing. This creates a big problem for me because I need my customers to contact me directly. For example, my website Parivartan Foundation: https://www.parivartanfoundation.com/, which runs a trusted Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi, has login and contact forms, but I cannot access the saved password easily through Firefox. Has anyone else faced this problem or knows a solution?

title: Is there a log for opened/closed tabs (that is not the History)? [Mysterious tabs randomly appearing and disappearing without leaving a History entry]
content:
Once in a while, my firefox has been randomly getting a mysterious tab appear and immediately disappear, leaving me no time to check what it was. There isn't a clear pattern to what triggers it or when does it happen... I think it happens like once or twice per day?

I assume it's just some buggy extension updating itself in the background or something like that, but I wanted to troubleshoot this issue just to be sure.

I wanted to check a log with details about previously opened/closed tabs, but these mysterious tabs leave no entries in the History at all. I searched around and couldn't find anything that helps me further. Is there anything like that I could check?

I'm not really sure if Troubleshoot Mode prevents this problem or not, since I haven't found a way to reliably reproduce it.

(I'm on 64-bit Windows, last observed this behavior on 142.0.1, but I updated to 143.0 just as I was about to post this)
creator: mateusauri
